root.description: The room is lit by the light of your torch hanging in a bracket on the wall.
root.hint: Geralt: "Kid ought to be happy I'm leading him up and out of here."

exit.description: A wooden #ladder^ climbs up to a trap door in the ceiling.
exit.onCheck: It looks sturdy enough to hold your weight. A cackling voice can be heard above.

exit.description: A set of uneven stone #stairs^ tumbles downward.
exit.onCheck: The air grows colder this way, but nothing can be heard.

prop.description: The #walls^ of the room are close and built of stone.
prop.onCheck: Claw #marks^ are carved into one of the #walls^.

prop.description: Deep claw #marks^ score one of the walls. The #marks^ fleck the walls of the #stairs^.
prop.onCheck: The deep scratches are that of a nekker. What was that nekker doing in Toussaint?

character.description: #Joss^ casts his eyes to the floor.
character.onCheck: He is hunched and rigid, teeming with spite.
character.onTalk: Joss: "You killed him. And all for no reason. Bring me out of this horrid hut that I might depart from you forever."
